org.tms.api.io

Interface DateTimeFormatIOOption<T extends DateTimeFormatIOOption<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOCOptions, org.tms.io.options.FormattedPageIOOptions, PDFOptions, RTFOptions

    public interface DateTimeFormatIOOption<T extends DateTimeFormatIOOption<T>>
    A IOOption where the output can have a date-time displayed in the output footer.

    Note: DateTimeFormatIOOption methods only affect export operations.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.1"
    See Also:
    FormattedPageIOOptions, SimpleDateFormat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDateTimeFormat()
      Returns the format pattern string used to display date-time values in export footers, if one has been defined.
      boolean hasDateTimeFormat()
      Returns true if a custom date-time format pattern has been defined.
      T withDateTimeFormat(String pattern)
      Set the date-time format pattern to use to display the time and date the in the page footnotes of the export.

    • Method Detail

      • getDateTimeFormat

        String getDateTimeFormat()
        Returns the format pattern string used to display date-time values in export footers, if one has been defined. The format string is a pattern describing the date and time format, as defined by SimpleDateFormat.
        Returns:
        the format string to be used to display date-time values in export footers
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat

      • hasDateTimeFormat

        boolean hasDateTimeFormat()
        Returns true if a custom date-time format pattern has been defined.
        Returns:
        true if a custom date-time format pattern has been defined

      • withDateTimeFormat

        T withDateTimeFormat(String pattern)
        Set the date-time format pattern to use to display the time and date the in the page footnotes of the export. The date-time format pattern follows the conventions described in SimpleDateFormat. To disable the display of the date-time in page footers, set pattern to null.

        The default value is MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a

        Parameters:
        pattern - the new date-time format pattern or null to disable
        Returns:
        a new T with the date-time format pattern set
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat
